code: import Platform from"react-native-web/dist/exports/Platform";import StatusBar from"react-native-web/dist/exports/StatusBar";import{theme}from'galio-framework';export var StatusHeight=StatusBar.currentHeight;export var HeaderHeight=theme.SIZES.BASE*3.5+(StatusHeight||0);export var iPhoneX=function iPhoneX(){return Platform.OS==='ios'&&(height===812||width===812);};
